verses.roman:
sarasvatī svapne tāṅre upadeśa kaila
sākṣāt īśvara kari' prabhuke jānila

synonyms: sarasvatī—mother Sarasvatī; svapne—in a dream; tāṅre—unto him; upadeśa—advice; kaila—gave; sākṣāt—directly; īśvara—the Supreme Person; kari'-accepting; prabhuke—the Lord; jānila—he understood.
translation: In a dream the goddess informed him of the Lord's position, and the poetic champion could understand that Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu is the Supreme Personality of Godhead Himself.
